text: Milton is a hamlet in Stirling, Scotland near the bigger village Aberfoyle. It was named after a mill that is no longer used. The mill has a cast iron millwheel from 1667. ==References== ==Other websites== *Canmore - Forth House, Milton, Aberfoyle site record *Canmore - Milton, Jean Macalpine's Inn site record Category:Hamlets in Scotland
title: Milton, Stirling
